channel.title: Comments for Copywriting Course – Copywriting 101, Enhancement Marketing

item.title: Comment on assignment_874_167493886263_What_is_Broken_3_Marc_Miller.docx by Neil Hedley
item.dc:creator: Neil Hedley
item.description: MARC! First of all, I don't know why I didn't see the flag from the system that this assignment had been submitted. That, too, appears broken. But I can't tell you how much I was shaking my head the entire time I was reading your submission. I've imported cars between Canada and the US multiple times. And it's just... well... it's just a pain in the ass. I stopped doing it. GREAT one.
item.content:encoded:
MARC! First of all, I don’t know why I didn’t see the flag from the system that this assignment had been submitted. That, too, appears broken.
But I can’t tell you how much I was shaking my head the entire time I was reading your submission. I’ve imported cars between Canada and the US multiple times. And it’s just… well… it’s just a pain in the ass. I stopped doing it.
GREAT one.

item.title: Comment on assignment_194_167374715058_Nina_Meiers_Assignment_One_TAGO.txt by Nina Meiers
item.dc:creator: Nina Meiers
item.description: Thank you - It's harder than I thought - So many iterations and then suddenly, bit by bit, it comes to you. Amazing really.
item.content:encoded: Thank you – It’s harder than I thought – So many iterations and then suddenly, bit by bit, it comes to you. Amazing really.

item.title: Comment on assignment_194_167374715058_Nina_Meiers_Assignment_One_TAGO.txt by a138b696_admin
item.dc:creator: a138b696_admin
item.description: Simply put: Nailed it. The line "Sometimes, amazing takes more than a minute" is going to stick with me. Length is comfortable, everything about it works. Great stuff.
item.content:encoded:
Simply put: Nailed it.
The line “Sometimes, amazing takes more than a minute” is going to stick with me.
Length is comfortable, everything about it works.
Great stuff.
